title: Hey Riot, Not enough Rune pages?
body: Is it me or what? I can only create a handful of run page 6 or something. Am i the only one?

replies.body: Is there a point? Literally only takes 10 seconds in champ select to edit one. What else are you going to be doing? Browsing the Boards? Watching YouTube or Twitch?

> [{quoted}](name=Akkordian Zoeve,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=Zygc2pwp,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-17T05:15:13.057+0000)
>
> Is there a point? Literally only takes 10 seconds in champ select to edit one. What else are you going to be doing? Browsing the Boards? Watching YouTube or Twitch?

or have a reallllly shitty laptop that freezes due to the animation the runes make every time you open the page or change them...
Then run it on Low Spec mode...
I mean... riot has issues with the client AND issues in game (Everyone getting FPS drops in random games) and you want to assume that running the client in low spec mode will do something?
Almost forgot about this thing.  How much does it affect the client?

depending on your PC specs and how much the client wants to mess with you, a good pc and if the internet and riot client aren't having hiccups,  you should be alright, but if your client freezes or dc's from the servers for even a few moments, it can make you not finish the page

> [{quoted}](name=Akkordian Zoeve,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=Zygc2pwp,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2017-11-17T18:02:10.896+0000)
>
> Then run it on Low Spec mode...

Nahhh never would of guessed! totally not like i'm already in that mode and its the client FREEZING or actually disconnecting. when multiple people complain about it, not just the players side.

Agreed.  Although there usually is sufficient time for me to edit the runes, sometimes in aram it really sucks when people wouldn't trade with you until like 20sec before selection ends - and then the screen freezes for another few sec when opening up the runes.

I heard you get x amount of rune pages depending on how many you bought on the old runes system . 

I.e  if you bought 6 with the old system you can have 6 custom ones.

Correct me if i'm wrong.

The number of Rune pages you can create right now depends on how many Rune pages you own before Preseason 8.
At the moment I can only create 5 Rune pages because I owned 5 Rune pages before Preseason 8.
You can buy Rune pages to create more Rune pages.

My 13 rune pages are plenty...

Too bad you didn't buy any when BE (IP) were easier to get. xD
